Own.description: Image Finder - personal study project of application to search and view images by keyword. For HTTP requests was used the public Pixabay API.

Team.name: Donut Masterclass
Team.description: Donut Masterclass project [after HTML/CSS course] - mobile-first adaptive web site of donut masterclass. Neat and tasty design, responsive layout.
Team.tasks: My tasks: section Registration, animation of the donuts , scroll-up button, stylization of validating (if the data is entered incorrectly, appears a cross and the line is highlighted in red, if is successful - appears a green check-mark and the line is highlighted in green).

Team.name: Event booster
Team.description: Event booster project [after JS course] -  mobile-first adaptive and responsive web site for finding events in the world, with ability to choose an event by name and country and buy tickets.
Team.tasks: My tasks: background rendering (mobile, tablet, desktop), themes switcher, team-modal window, dynamic scroll-up button, section Footer, all visual part of application interface at light theme, animation of the main title, animation of movement of the selected page in pagination.

Others.name: Covid-19
Others.description: Covid-19 - application about Coronavirus (covid-19) daily infected, recovery, and  death information global and by selected countries.

Others.name: JsClock
Others.description: JsClock - simple Background Change Clock application. Every second background change when clock time change.

Others.name: Countdown timer
Others.description: Countdown timer - a custom timer plugin that counts down to a predefined date. Can be used on blogs, event registration pages, etc.
